p: Information provided about the diagnostic test used varied considerably between articles (n = 126): 25/126 (19.8%) did not state any details regarding diagnostic tests used; 64/126 (50.8%) described specific methods used; and 27/126 (21.4%) provided references to articles which described the test. Only 12 articles gave the diagnostic sensitivity and specificity of the tests (12/126 [9.5%]), seven of which used a commercial test [ 46â€“ 50].
